trans-unit.source: An abstract class used as a base class for other formatters, (for example, <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.AtomPub10CategoriesDocumentFormatter" />).
This class is abstract and cannot be instantiated directly.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別是抽象的，而且無法直接具現化。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.CategoriesDocumentFormatter" /> class.
Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.CategoriesDocumentFormatter" /> class.
The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.CategoriesDocument" /> to serialize.

Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.CategoriesDocumentFormatter" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.CategoriesDocument" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> to read from.
Verifies whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> contains a valid Atom 1.0 categories document.
A value that specifies whether the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> contains a valid Atom 1.0 categories document.

Creates a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.InlineCategoriesDocument" /> that can be serialized into a <<see langword="atom:categories" />> element within a service document and contains the set of categories within the element.
Returns an <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.InlineCategoriesDocument" /> that can be serialized into a <<see langword="atom:categories" />> element within a service document.

Creates a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.ReferencedCategoriesDocument" /> that can be serialized into a <<see langword="atom:categories" />> element within a service document and contains a URI reference to the set of categories within the element.
Returns a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.ReferencedCategoriesDocument" /> that can be serialized into a <<see langword="atom:categories" />> element within a service document.
Gets the categories document.
Returns the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.CategoriesDocument" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.CategoriesDocumentFormatter" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回與此 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.CategoriesDocument" /> 相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.CategoriesDocumentFormatter" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> to read from.
Reads an Atom 1.0 <<see langword="atom:categories" />> element from the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> instance.
The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.CategoriesDocument" /> to associate with the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.CategoriesDocumentFormatter" />.
Specifies the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.CategoriesDocument" /> to associate with the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.CategoriesDocumentFormatter" />.
Gets the syndication version used by the formatter.
The syndication version used by the formatter.
trans-unit.target: 格式器所使用的新聞訂閱版本。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] supports Atom 1.0 and RSS 2.0 syndication versions.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 支援 Atom 1.0 和 RSS 2.0 新聞訂閱版本。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> to write to.

Writes the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.CategoriesDocument" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.CategoriesDocumentFormatter" /> to the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />.
